page.title: 19CHILD'S DAY IN CHARLTON
page.content: On Sunday mornings I get out of bed and go downstairs at 7 o'clock and wake my brother up. We watch some television till 8.3O. After breakfast I go and get ready for gymnastics,then I go to see if my friend would like to play with me.At 11.OO I go to gymnastics till 12.OO. After lunch I sometimes go up to play with Lily and we play with the kittens and on bikes. I go home at teatime and I go and see if Lisa would like to play again. We play in the garden until it is 7.45, then I have to go home to get ready for bed. I have a chat with Mum and Dad and at 8 o'clock I go to bed.
